title: Article 5 - Uniform System of Accounts
content:
Article 5 - Uniform System of Accounts

State Regulations

Part 46 - Applications Under Uniform System Of Accounts (§ 46.1 to 46.5)

Part 47 - Applications Provided For In Notes To Accounts For Capital Stock For Electric, Gas, Steam, Waterworks, Omnibus Corporations And Class C Telephone Corporation (§ 47.1 to 47.4)

Part 48 - Material Changes In Accounting For Class A Utilities (§ 48.1 to 48.5 to 48.7)

Part 49 - Repealed (§ 49.1 to 49.3)

Part 50 - Repealed (§ 50.1 to 50.2)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
